name: Classic Logo Hoodie
description: Premium heavyweight hoodie featuring the iconic Raw Threads logo. Made from 100% brushed cotton fleece for ultimate comfort. Ribbed cuffs and hem with a kangaroo pocket.

name: Street Culture Tee
description: Oversized streetwear tee with bold graphic print on the back. Drop shoulder fit, 100% combed cotton. Available in multiple colorways.

name: Raw Threads Cap
description: Structured snapback cap with embroidered Raw Threads branding. Adjustable snap closure fits all sizes. Premium cotton twill construction.

name: Urban Cargo Joggers
description: Relaxed fit cargo joggers with utility pockets. Elastic waistband with drawcord. Tapered leg with elasticated cuffs. Perfect for street and casual wear.

name: Graphic Print Tee
description: Statement graphic tee with Raw Threads original artwork. Relaxed fit, soft-touch fabric. Screen printed for vibrant, long-lasting colors.

name: Premium Zip Hoodie
description: Full-zip hoodie in premium heavyweight fabric. Double-layered hood, metal zip, and split kangaroo pockets. The ultimate layering piece.

name: Essential Crew Neck
description: Everyday essential crew neck tee. Clean minimalist design with subtle Raw Threads embroidery on chest. Super soft ringspun cotton.

name: Varsity Bomber Jacket
description: Classic varsity-style bomber jacket with Raw Threads lettering. Wool blend body with faux leather sleeves. Ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem.
